definition: in a little while/in a moment/later on
more than one would wish/somewhat/a bit too (old, contrived, distracting etc)
variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]
variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]

sentences.english: Squat with your feet a little less than shoulder distance apart.
Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentences.chinese: 山頂上升氣流強度隨速矢端跡曲率加大而稍有加強。

sentences.english: Fell like the left side stays high with no change in the spine angle.
sentences.chinese: 感覺左肩稍高，以保持脊柱角度不變。

sentences.english: A moment of low intensity in a televised football game is seen by some as time to change channels.
sentences.chinese: 轉播的足球比賽若是稍不激烈，一些人就準備換臺。

sentences.english: Dr. Goldfine: Hold on. I'll go and talk to my client.
sentences.chinese: 稍等，我去和我的客戶談一下。

sentences.english: They're a little bit better now.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們稍好一點兒了。

sentences.english: Better to price your app a bit high to start.
sentences.chinese: 剛開始把程序定稍高一點會更好。

sentences.english: Actually, I need to amend this.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，我需要稍做修改。

sentences.english: It looks a lot like the EVO, but in a far smaller package.
sentences.chinese: 它很多地方都很像EVO，只是尺寸稍小。

sentences.english: Fulla also has two female friends, Yasmine and Nada, with lighter hair.
sentences.chinese: 芙拉還有兩個女伴，雅斯敏和娜達，她們的髮色稍淺。

sentences.english: We expected a bit more but it was not forthcoming.
sentences.chinese: 我們預計會有稍多一點的成果，但沒有達成。

sentences.english: The boy was slightly taller than his father.
sentences.chinese: 那個男孩比他父親稍高，長得眉清目秀。

sentences.english: The characteristic is the yellowish dome shaped shelter.
sentences.chinese: 日本石龜的特點是稍黃色的和圓頂形狀的龜甲。

sentences.english: Take a seat please, Councillor Jones will see you in a moment.
sentences.chinese: 請稍坐，瓊斯政務委員即刻就見你。

sentences.english: Wait a minute, we thought he was a Democrat.
sentences.chinese: 稍等，我們認爲這一位是一名民主黨人。

definition: a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
Diandian (Chinese microblogging and social networking website)
erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
a moment/a while/in a moment/now...now.../also pr. [yi1 hui3 r5]
